com.netflix.spectator.placeholders

Class MdcTagFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.spectator.placeholders.MdcTagFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TagFactory

    public class MdcTagFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements TagFactory
    A TagFactory implementation that extracts information from the Sl4fj MDC data. If the MDC for the current thread has no value associated with the specified name at the time that the createTag method is invoked, then that method will return null, which will result in the tag being omitted.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MdcTagFactory(java.lang.String name)
      Construct a new instance that will return a Tag with the MDC value associated with the specified name at the time that the createTag method is invoked.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      com.netflix.spectator.api.Tag createTag()
      Produces a tag based on the runtime context available to the factory.
      java.lang.String name()
      Returns the name of the factory, which is used as the key for any Tag produced by the createTag method.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
